FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh! What is it?<sp:5:0:0> Don't tell me you and I
are in the same line of work.

You're looking for treasure, aren't you?


Me too. The outfit's just so I could
infiltrate the Zonai Survey Team without
attracting suspicion.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I thought it'd give me access to some
treasure leads...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But it turns out that they don't just hand
those out. Worse yet,<sp:5:0:0> they put me on
dangerous investigations!
What rotten luck.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>I'm about to go investigate the <clr:0000>chasm in
Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>But I really don't want to.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0001>I mean, there's a <clr:0000>huge monster <clr:ffff>on the
Bridge of Hylia. With <clr:0000>three heads<clr:ffff>!

How can they expect me to get any
research done with that thing there?
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're a treasure hunter, these woods
are a great place to search. Lots of caves
and old ruins.
I even found one <clr:0000>cave that looked like
a ruin<clr:ffff>! And let me tell you, that place
reeked of treasure.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I just wish I didn't get lost right after I
found it. Now I have no idea where it was.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I found a cave earlier while I was hunting
for treasure in the <clr:0000>woods<clr:ffff>.

The inside of it actually <clr:0000>looked like a ruin<clr:ffff>.
I could just smell the treasure somewhere
in there!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Problem is, after I left, I got all turned
around. I'm lucky I found the road.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>But when I'm finished up here, I'll try to
retrace my steps to the cave.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>There's another <clr:0000>chasm northeast of
Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>. I've been ordered to
investigate that one too.
<sp:3:0:2:0401>But I don't want to do such a dangerous
investigation! <sp:5:0:0>Couldn't someone else
handle that chasm for me?
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ruins from the ancient past are common
enough in the woods around here.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>But really, they're just a bunch of old
stones and slabs and stuff. None of
that counts as treasure.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Whoa!<sp:5:0:0> Hey! <sp:5:1:0>I've never even heard of a
monster like this!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>I'll tell you, thought I was a goner...<sp:5:0:0>
You're pretty impressive. Thanks!
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> I guess I should have stuck to
treasure hunting the old-fashioned way.

Then I'd be free as a bird, like you.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration>Wow, <sp:5:0:0>you're amazing!<sp:5:0:0> You might even
be stronger than my sister.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Anyway, you saved me, so a big thanks
from me. You're incredible.
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was so glad when I got into the
survey team. But then they put me on
research morning, noon, and night...
It's exhausting. <sp:5:0:0>I'm exhausted. <sp:5:0:0>And I still
don't have any leads.

Maybe I should've gone after <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure <clr:ffff>like all those rabid <clr:0000>Cece fans<clr:ffff>.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Here. <sp:5:0:0>Just a little something for your
trouble. Take it.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkDeny>I was asked to investigate the chasm
on <clr:0000>Hylia Island<clr:ffff>, but...<sp:5:0:0>yikes.

If there was treasure in the chasm,
that'd be a different story. <sp:5:1:0>Without any
payoff, I can't say I'm excited.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Oh man! <sp:5:0:0>That was a close one.<sp:5:0:0> You really
saved me there.
StartPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Why didn't they put me on the
<clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff> job? That would've been
a much better deal.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>There are lots of ancient ruins around
this area. <sp:5:0:0>But that place specifically has
long been known as the <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>What a relief that you came along.<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
NightGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_01>I have to do survey-team work even at
night?<sp:5:0:0> I have the worst luck.
NightGreet_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Out for a walk at this late hour?<sp:5:0:0>
The night is...<sp:5:1:0>night, you know?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm supposed to investigate the <clr:0000>chasm at
Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>.

But there's a huge <clr:0000>three-headed monster<clr:ffff>
on the Bridge of Hylia.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Considering the danger, you'd think
they might let me off the hook, but
nope.<sp:5:1:0> *sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I am not cut out for this.
BackRange_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm about to go investigate the <clr:0000>chasm at
Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>But I really don't want to.<sp:5:1:0>


At least someone got rid of that huge,
<clr:0000>three-headed monster <clr:ffff>that was on the
Bridge of Hylia.
I mean, it's still dangerous there. Just
slightly less so.
SavedLv1_00: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> You saved me!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>Oww... <sp:5:0:0>That was a disaster. I kinda just
want to cry.
BackRange_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>There was a huge, three-headed monster
at the Bridge of Hylia. <sp:5:0:0>But now it's gone.
Did someone defeat it?
I guess that'll make it safer to investigate
the <clr:0000>chasm at Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>.

Not safe, but you know. <sp:5:0:0>Safer.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sigh>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>If only my sister were here...


Oh, but you were great. <sp:5:0:0>Really,
SO helpful.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My sister, Mina, and I used to hunt for
treasure as a pair.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>Then she had the bright idea for me to
infiltrate the Zonai Survey Team.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>So we split up. <sp:5:0:0>She headed east, and I
came here to scope out leads.

I wonder what she's up to. <sp:5:0:0>Knowing her,
she's hunting for treasure day and night.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Honestly, if you think about it...<sp:5:0:0>I got the
easy job!

So no more complaining! <sp:5:1:0>I'll just shut my
mouth till I got what I came here for!
BackRange_01_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><clr:0000>Chasms <clr:ffff>are dangerous. I don't know why
anyone would dive into one by choice!

Besides, the <clr:0000>Bridge of Hylia <clr:ffff>overlooks a
perfectly good <clr:0000>geoglyph<clr:ffff>. Why couldn't
they have had me investigate that?
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM>Thanks for the assistance! <sp:5:0:0>I should really
just leave the monsters to you.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkDeny>It's my job to investigate the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> on
that island. <sp:5:0:0>But an investigation that
dangerous is too much for me.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This place has long been known as the
<clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>You know, I'd bet there's
gotta be treasure here somewhere.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>I wonder if this rain comes off the sea of
trees to the east.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>At least it's an excuse to take a break
from investigating. So I can't say I really
mind it.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Chat_01>There's another <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northeast of
Lake Hylia<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I was told to go there next
after I'm done here.
